sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para:
FreeRTOS is supplied as standard C source files built along with the other C files in your project. This repository contains a port of FreeRTOS kernel for Infineon MCUs based on Arm Cortex-M0 (CM0), Cortex-M0+ (CM0P), Cortex-M4 (CM4), Cortex-M33 (CM33), and Cortex-R4 (CR4) cores.
Cortex M33 (CM33) and Cortex R4 (CR4) are currently supported only on GCC_ARM Additional information about using this library in ModusToolbox software including a Quick Start guide can be found in the library's README.md file.

sect1.title: FreeRTOS configurations
sect1.para: To configure FreeRTOS, copy the pre-configured FreeRTOSConfig.h file from the freertos/Source/portable folder to your project and modify the copied configuration file as needed. See Configuration Consideration section of the README.md file.
